Detailed Description

template<class Data>
class ItemMap< Data >

Use this class to store item attributes as tables in the Map.

To get the data of a specific item, use find with item ID as the key. An ItemMap<Data>::iterator or ItemMap<Data>::const_iterator is returned. Check that it differs from ItemMap::end().

When inserting data for an item, call ItemMap::insert with a pair storing item ID in first and the data in second.

This class is currently implemented for data of the types:

  • uint32
  • MC2String
  • set<uint16>
  • vector<GMSLane>
  • bool

Implement the methods loadOneItem saveOneItem and oneItemDBufSize when you need to support a new type of Data.
